data.description: Raw data to data frames for machine learning
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The module aids by evaluating features on data samples (hence
    Data::Feature) but doesn't provide the features themselves, rather a
    way to simplify creating them (hence Factory). The name pattern is
    inspired by XML::SAX::ParserFactory.

    Lingua::Phonology::Features mentioned as a related module has a
    similar notion of features, including distinguishing between binary
    features, scalar features etc. but serves a completely different
    purpose: defining a hierarchy of features.
